title: Wandrille DORCHIES
text: Hello ! My name is Wandrille Dorchies, I am currently studying at ENSAI, enrolled in the Dip.Ing/MSc Data Science track.

title: Data related stuff

title: Data related stuff
section: Plan B: Build a dashboard to track my runs
text: Plan B: Build a dashboard to track my runs

title: Sports
text:
I have been playing basketball casually since 2015. I played for ENSAI’s team during the 2024-2025 academic year, in local inter-university competitions. I was also the captain of the basketball team at the TOSS, a France-wide inter-school tournament.



My favorite team is the Minnesota Timberwolves.
Planning on building a small dashboard to track their performances throughout the season, and even make some prediction, once I complete Lino Galiana’s Python for Data Science and MLOps courses.






I picked up running seriously in late 2024. My goals for 2025-26 include the 10km at Tout Rennes Court in October ’25, the Onatera Paris 17 10km in November ’25 and the Stockholm Marathon in May ’26.

title: Hobbies homepage
text:
I’ve been playing basketball casually for ~ 10 years now. I got my first taste of competition through ENSAI’s team.



I’ve ran on and off for a long time. I picked it up seriously in late 2024. My current objective is the Stockholm marathon at the end of may 2025.
